verses.verse: Mungu nawe nanyi daima; hata twonane ya pili, Awachunge kwa fadhili, Mungu nawe nanyi daima.
verses.refrain: Hata twonane juu, hata twonane tena kwake; Hata twonane juu, Mungu nawe nanyi daima.
verses.verse: Mungu nawe nanyi daima; awafunike mabawa, Awalishe, awakuze; Mungu nawe nanyi daima.
Mungu nawe nanyi daima; kila wakati wa shida Awalinde hifadhini; Mungu nawe nanyi daima.
Mungu nawe nanyi daima; awabariki na pendo Ambalo halina mwisho; Mungu nawe nanyi daima.
